title: Asian Stocks Fall as Wall Street Tech Sell-Off Weighs on Global Markets
shortdescription: Asian shares fell Thursday after fresh declines in technology sectors weighed on Wall Street.
description: Asian shares fell Thursday after fresh declines in technology sectors weighed on Wall Street, raising concerns over high valuations and the AI rally.
author: Henry Willy

title: Federal Reserve Cuts Rates 0.75% in December – Biggest Single Cut Since 2008 Financial Crisis
shortdescription: Fed surprises markets with aggressive 75bps cut, citing deflation risks and economic slowdown concerns.
description: S&P 500 rockets 4.2% as Fed delivers largest rate cut since 2008 crisis, slashing rates to 4.00% amid deflation concerns.
author: Henry Willy

title: Tesla Unveils Model 3 Redesign and $25K Entry Model – Stock Jumps 12% on Production Timeline
shortdescription: Elon Musk reveals new compact EV will begin deliveries in Q2 2026, targeting 5 million units annually.
description: Model 2 $25K EV receives 2.5M pre-orders, revolutionary unboxed manufacturing enables mass production at unprecedented scale.
author: Henry Willy

title: Amazon AWS Announces $100B AI Infrastructure Investment – Cloud Revenue Exceeds $30B Quarterly
shortdescription: World's largest cloud provider commits to building largest AI supercomputer cluster ever constructed.
description: AWS $100B investment deploys 2M GPUs, cloud revenue hits $30B quarterly with $80B in committed AI contracts.
author: Henry Willy
